title: What Was the Best Year for Video Games Ever?
description: Today’s special episode takes The Besties into a new direction. With newer releases being put on hold, the gang is looking back at what was the best year for video games ever. Each present cases for why the year stood out and examine all the variables. Listeners can get in on the action by heading over to https://twitter.com/thebestiespod and cast their vote to help pick a winner!
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
